vortexmod.ponder.time_rotor.header: Powering the TARDIS with a time rotor!
vortexmod.ponder.time_rotor.text_1: The Time Rotor is responsible for providing thrust and stabilizing the TARDIS.
vortexmod.ponder.time_rotor.text_2: It requires atleast 32 RPM to operate, though increasing the RPM makes it stronger.
vortexmod.ponder.time_rotor.text_3: You can have multiple of them in one TARDIS to increase the strength as well.
vortexmod.ponder.flight_computer.header: Managing the TARDIS with the Flight Computer!
vortexmod.ponder.flight_computer.text_1: The Flight Computer is essential for assembling and disassembling the TARDIS.
vortexmod.ponder.flight_computer.text_2: It displays and controls all the variables in the TARDIS such as the target location.
vortexmod.ponder.flight_computer.text_3: It requires atleast 32 RPM to operate.
vortexmod.ponder.flight_controller.heade: Flying the TARDIS with the Flight Controller!
vortexmod.ponder.flight_controller.text_: The Flight Controller is the actual control panel for the TARDIS.
Right clicking it will mount you onto the TARDIS where you can fly using your movement keys, your jump bind, and your descent bind (Different than crouch).
It requires atleast 32 RPM to operate.
vortexmod.ponder.space_circuit.header: How to fold the fabric of space!
vortexmod.ponder.space_circuit.text_1: The Space Circuit allows you to teleport to the target coords once you get to 39.3 m/s (88 mph).
vortexmod.ponder.space_circuit.text_2: You can toggle it on and off by powering it with a redstone signal.
vortexmod.ponder.space_circuit.text_3: It requires atleast 32 RPM to operate.
